name: Bãi Bụt
address: Bãi Bụt, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Bãi Bụt is a beautiful beach known for its serene atmosphere and scenic views.

name: Ghềnh Bàng
address: Ghềnh Bàng, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Ghềnh Bàng is a pristine beach surrounded by rocky formations and lush greenery, perfect for relaxation.

name: VinWonders Nam Hội An
address: VinWonders, Nam Hội An, Quảng Nam, Vietnam
description: VinWonders Nam Hội An is a large amusement park featuring thrilling rides and entertainment for all ages.

name: Cầu Rồng
address: Cầu Rồng, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: The Dragon Bridge is a famous bridge in Da Nang, known for its dragon-shaped design and nightly light displays.

name: Núi Ngũ Hành Sơn
address: Ngũ Hành Sơn, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: The Marble Mountains (Ngũ Hành Sơn) is a cluster of five limestone hills with caves, tunnels, and Buddhist sanctuaries.

name: Đèo Hải Vân
address: Đèo Hải Vân, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: The Hai Van Pass is a scenic mountain pass offering breathtaking views of the ocean and surrounding landscapes.

name: Suối Mơ
address: Suối Mơ, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Suối Mơ is a tranquil waterfall surrounded by lush forests, perfect for nature lovers and those seeking peace.

name: Thác Ba Đờ Phọt
address: Thác Ba Đờ Phọt, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Ba Đờ Phọt Waterfall is a hidden gem with a beautiful cascading waterfall and scenic surroundings.

name: Làng nghề nước mắm Nam Ô
address: Làng nghề nước mắm Nam Ô, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Nam Ô Fish Sauce Village is famous for its traditional fish sauce production, an important part of Vietnamese cuisine.

name: Làng cổ Phong Nam
address: Làng cổ Phong Nam, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Phong Nam Ancient Village is a well-preserved traditional village with ancient architecture and a peaceful atmosphere.

address: Làng bánh tráng Túy Loan, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Túy Loan Rice Paper Village is known for its traditional rice paper production process, where visitors can learn and participate.

name: Giếng Trời
address: Giếng Trời, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Giếng Trời (Heaven's Well) is a scenic natural pool surrounded by lush forests and towering cliffs, ideal for trekking.

name: Đỉnh Bàn Cờ
address: Đỉnh Bàn Cờ, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: Bàn Cờ Peak offers stunning panoramic views of Da Nang and the surrounding coastline, making it a popular hiking destination.

name: Hải đăng Tiên Sa
address: Hải đăng Tiên Sa, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
description: The Tiên Sa Lighthouse is located on a hill overlooking the ocean and offers spectacular views of Da Nang and its coastline.

name: Hồ Đồng Xanh – Đồng Nghệ
address: Hồ Đồng Xanh, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam

address: Bãi biển Mỹ Khê, Đà Nẵng, Vietnam
